pr_title: CB-6217 Intorduce test case timeout for all the E2E test cases

timeline.message: CB-6217 Intorduce test case timeout for all the E2E test cases

timeline.bodyText: Is this a suite timeout or individual testcase timeout?
timeline.author: lnardai

replies.bodyText:
Hi, Based on my knowledge the timeout for tests. You can define this at suite or test level. However this always means test timeout. If you define a different timeout for a specified test, you can override the test suite setting also.
For example: TestNG – Timeout Test Tutorial
replies.author: aszegedi
